attributes.action: Jail Sexual Predators whom wait around Unpoliced Public Toilets for Young Teenage Boys for Life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Convicted Sexual Perverts that wait around rarely used toilets, looking to rape or abuse young vulnerable innocent teenage boys, should be Jailed for Life.
These perverts damage boys for Life - They must Face Life in Prison.
Men whom sexualy assualt these children put Animals of Prey to Shame.
Fathers & Mothers if you care for your Teenage boys, please vote, then these men will face Justice, too many of these men hide behind the facade of Homosexuality, which they are not.
